page.title: 17CHILDREN'S RECREATION
page.content: I play a lot of games , heres a list of them football , climbing , looking for shells , skipping stones , skipping , swimming , fighting , go for walks , looking for old houses. I play football in Cae Bog.I think it is a good place to play football as the ground is hard.There are two goals each side. I climb nearly everywhere.It is a good hobby but sometimes it is dangerous. I have a wide selection of shells.I collect them from beaches. Skipping stones is quite good.You have to remember to do a lot of things. Looking for houses is a good hobby.But it is best to go with a grown up as it is dangerous.
